message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I believe is worth a lot to you.  I'm offering it to you for $12,000. It's a great deal and I'm sure we can come to an agreement. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product and am willing to pay up to $8,000 for it. I hope we can reach a fair agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but it's a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a little bit, but $9,500 is my bottom line. I believe this is still a good deal for both of us. Let's make this happen!
